Publication 荒瀬班の研究業績

学術論文

  1. Dialogue Breakdown Detection Robust to Variations in Annotators and Dialogue Systems
    Junya Takayama, Eriko Nomoto and Yuki Arase
    Computer Speech & Language Vol. 54, pp.31-43, March 2019
  2. トレンドキーワードに関するウェブリソースの横断的分析
    吉田 光男, 荒瀬 由紀
    情報処理学会論文誌：データベース, Vol.9, No.1, pp.20-30, April 2016
  3. Boosting the Efficiency of First-order Abductive Reasoning Using Pre-estimated Relatedness between Predicates
    Kazeto Yamamoto, Naoya Inoue, Kentaro Inui, Yuki Arase and Jun'ichi Tsujii
    International Journal of Machine Learning and Computing, Vol.5, No.2, pp.114-120, April 2015
  4. ラベル伝搬によるトレンドクエリのカテゴリ推定
    吉田 光男, 荒瀬 由紀
    人工知能学会論文誌, Vol.30, No.1, pp.161-17, January 2015

国際会議

  1. Contextualized Word Representations for Multi-Sense Embedding
    Kazuki Ashihara, Tomoyuki Kajiwara, Yuki Arase and Satoru Uchida
    In proceedings of Pacific Asia Conference on Language, Information and Computation (PACLIC2018), December 2018
  2. Recursive Neural Network Based Preordering for English-to-Japanese Machine Translation
    Yuki Kawara, Chenhui Chu and Yuki Arase
    In proceedings of ACL 2018, Student Research Workshop， pp.21-27， July 2018
  3. CEFR-based Lexical Simplification Dataset
    Satoru Uchida, Shohei Takada and Yuki Arase
    In proceedings of Language Resources and Evaluation Conference (LREC 2018), May 2018
  4. SPADE: Evaluation Dataset for Monolingual Phrase Alignment
    Yuki Arase and Jun'ichi Tsujii
    In proceedings of Language Resources and Evaluation Conference (LREC 2018), May 2018
  5. Dialogue Breakdown Detection Considering Annotation Biases
    Junya Takayama, Eriko Nomoto and Yuki Arase
    Dialog System Technology Challenges 6 (DSTC6), December 2017
  6. Monolingual Phrase Alignment on Parse Forests
    Yuki Arase, Jun'ichi Tsujii
    In proceedings of Conference on Empirical Methods in Natural Language Processing (EMNLP 2017)， pp.1-11, September 2017
  7. Analysis of Similarity Measures between Short Text for the NTCIR-12 Short Text Conversation Task
    Kozo Chikai and Yuki Arase
    In proceedings of NTCIR Conference on Evaluation of Information Access Technologies (NTCIR-12), June 2016
  8. Wikipedia Page View Reflects Web Search Trend
    Mitsuo Yoshida, Yuki Arase, Takaaki Tsunoda and Mikio Yamamoto
    ACM Web Science conference (WebSci15)， June 2015
